ads_4.US: {RED}[X Community] {LIME}Press Z or X (default radio keys) to use quick commands such as saving points. If you have bound other keys, you can also enter {RED}console command {DEFAULT} {PURPLE}radio{DEFAULT} and {ORANGE}radio1{DEFAULT} to open the menu.
